ComicInfo.Title: Titans; Command Performance; Domestic Tranquility
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-05-28 18:09:58. [CVDB200775] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-16 20:25:20. [Issue ID 289202]

ComicInfo.Summary:
Titans: Billionaire computer genius Max Solomon runs across rumors of The Mink's abilities and decides to investigate whether the stories are true.
Command Performance: In ancient Greece, a house mistress shows her new male slave his "duties".
Domestic Tranquility: Constance is hired to track down a maid missing from the estate of publisher J. M. Tyme.
